TITLE: Configuring Esbuild for Phoenix in config.exs
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure esbuild for a Phoenix application in config.exs, including setting up entry points, output directories, and environment variables.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
config :esbuild,
  version: "0.18.6",
  default: [
    args: ~w(js/app.js --bundle --target=es2016 --outdir=../priv/static/assets),
    cd: Path.expand("../assets", __DIR__),
    env: %{"NODE_PATH" => Path.expand("../deps", __DIR__)}
  ]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Esbuild as a Dependency in Mix.exs
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to add esbuild as a dependency in a Mix project. It demonstrates two approaches: adding it as a runtime dependency in production, or as a development-only dependency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
def deps do
  [
    {:esbuild, "~> 0.7", runtime: Mix.env() == :dev}
  ]
end
```

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
def deps do
  [
    {:esbuild, "~> 0.7", only: :dev}
  ]
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Esbuild to Phoenix in mix.exs
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to add esbuild as a dependency in a Phoenix application's mix.exs file, including overriding the Phoenix version if needed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
def deps do
  [
    {:phoenix, github: "phoenixframework/phoenix", branch: "v1.5", override: true},
    {:esbuild, "~> 0.7", runtime: Mix.env() == :dev}
  ]
end
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Esbuild Profiles in config.exs
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to configure execution profiles for esbuild in the config.exs file, including specifying default arguments and working directory.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
config :esbuild,
  version: "0.18.6",
  default: [
    args: ~w(js/app.js),
    cd: Path.expand("../assets", __DIR__)
  ]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Esbuild Watcher in Phoenix dev.exs
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure esbuild as a file watcher in Phoenix's dev.exs configuration file, enabling watch mode and source maps.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
  esbuild: {Esbuild, :install_and_run, [:default, ~w(--sourcemap=inline --watch)]}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding assets.deploy Alias for Deployment
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to add an assets.deploy Mix alias in mix.exs for deploying minified assets.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
"assets.deploy": ["esbuild default --minify", "phx.digest"]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Invoking Esbuild via Mix Task
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to invoke esbuild using the Mix task with various options for bundling and minifying JavaScript files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ mix esbuild default assets/js/app.js --bundle --minify --target=es2016 --outdir=priv/static/assets/
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing JavaScript Dependencies in app.js
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import JavaScript dependencies in a Phoenix application, either from vendor directories or from npm packages.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import topbar from "../vendor/topbar"
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import topbar from "topbar"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Esbuild Version in config.exs
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure the esbuild version in the config.exs file of a Phoenix application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: elixir
CODE:
```
config :esbuild, version: "0.18.6"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Esbuild via Mix Task
DESCRIPTION: Command for installing esbuild using the provided Mix task.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
$ mix esbuild.install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing CSS in JavaScript for Bundling
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to import CSS files in JavaScript to have esbuild bundle them.
SOURCE: https://github.com/phoenixframework/esbuild/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-18_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import "../css/app.css"
```
